titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of the National Anthem Project, which has worked to restore America's voice by re-teaching Americans to sing the national anthem.
Supporting the goals and ideals of the National Anthem Project, which has worked to restore America's voice by re-teaching Americans to sing the national anthem.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
Supports the goals and ideals of the National Anthem Project, which re-teaches Americans to sing the national anthem, "The Star-Spangled Banner."
Commends those who have participated in such Project.
Encourages learning the national anthem and about its proud history.
